Package org.opensourcephysics.display

Class OSPDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • org.opensourcephysics.display.OSPDialog
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DrawingDialog

    public class OSPDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    OSPDialog is a standard dialog that can remain hidden in applet mode. Copyright: Copyright (c) 2002
    See Also:
